bibl.title: Who was Who in the Aristocracy of Byzantine Oxyrhynchus.
Proceedings of the 27th International Congress of Papyrology Warsaw, 29 July - 3 August 2013.

bibl.note: Oxyrhynchus, ca. 586-598. - The document provides a short snapshot of the aristocracy of Byzantine Oxyrhynchus.
bibl.seg: Usama A. Gad, Who was Who in the Aristocracy of Byzantine Oxyrhynchus.

Tomasz Derda, Adam Łajtar & Jakub Urbanik (edd.), in cooperation with Andrzej Mirończuk & Tomasz Ochała, Proceedings of the 27th International Congress of Papyrology, Warsaw, 29 July - 3 August 2013. Volume III. Studying Papyri = The Journal of Juristic Papyrology. Supplements. Volume XXVIII (Warsaw, 2016) pp. 1787-1799, 2 tabl., 1 pl.
Oxyrhynchus, ca. 586-598. - The document provides a short snapshot of the aristocracy of Byzantine Oxyrhynchus.
